snippet: Making time in your workday for a few minutes of daydreaming or a walk around the block can help you improve your productivity and avoid stress.
abstract: Phyllis Korkki Workstation column cites a growing body of evidence showing that taking regular breaks from mental tasks improves productivity and creativity--and that skipping breaks can lead to stress and exhaustion.
lead_paragraph: Making time in your workday for a few minutes of daydreaming or a walk around the block can help you improve your productivity and avoid stress.

headline.print_headline: To Stay On Schedule, Take A Break
headline.seo: Take Breaks Regularly to Stay on Schedule - Workstation
headline.main: To Stay on Schedule, Take a Break
